snippet: Police officials in Moscow on Tuesday detained a dancer at the Bolshoi Ballet, Pavel Dmitrichenko, in connection with a January acid attack on the company’s artistic director.
abstract: Police officials in Moscow detain Pavel Dmitrichenko, dancer at the Bolshoi Ballet, in connection with acid attack in January on the company’s artistic director Sergei Filin; Filin says he was attacked over a professional grudge; crime has gripped city and left one of Russia's most revered institutions in turmoil.
lead_paragraph: Police officials in Moscow on Tuesday detained a dancer at the Bolshoi Ballet, Pavel Dmitrichenko, in connection with a January acid attack on the company’s artistic director.

headline.seo: Bolshoi Dancer Held in Acid Attack on Sergei Filin
headline.main: Dancer Held in Acid Attack on Bolshoi Director
headline.print_headline: Dancer Held in Acid Attack on Bolshoi Director
